Sphinx Demo

Documenting Processes¶

You can also document the processes of how they should be performed within your project or repository.

Here is the example of step-by-step guidance in an .rst file:

Mandatory process
----------------------

#. Import the function
#. Validate inputs
#. Handle exceptions

.. caution::
   Division by zero raises an exception.

And here is how it looks in the built documentation

Mandatory process¶

  1. Import the function

  2. Validate inputs

  3. Handle exceptions

Caution

Division by zero raises an exception.
